name: Fang Fighter
ability: Concordia Faceoff: While you defend, if the attack range is 1 and you are in the attacker's [Front], change 1 result to an [Evade] result.

pilots.name: Fenn Rau
pilots.caption: Skull Leader
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform an attack, if the attack range is 1, you may roll 1 additional die.

pilots.name: Joy Rekkoff
pilots.caption: Skull Squadron Ace
pilots.ability: While you perform an attack, you may spend 1 [Charge] from an equipped [Torpedoes] upgrade. If you do, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die.

pilots.name: Old Teroch
pilots.caption: Mandalorian Mentor
pilots.ability: At the start of the Engagement Phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at range 1. If you do and you are in its (forward firing arc), it removes all of its green tokens.

pilots.name: Zealous Recruit
pilots.text: Mandalorian Fang fighter pilots must master the Concordia Faceoff maneuver, leveraging their ships' narrow attack profile to execute deadly head-on charges.
